_header: I served Our Lady both night and day
Note: Formerly 2719; now alphabetized to include the couplet heading.
_description: On the Redemption — four couplets, with couplet heading

BodRawC86.Transcription:
I saruyd oure lady bothe nythte and daythe louyr that I mayoure
                    lady hade a childe bothe fryssh and gayewiche ded for wus on goode
                    frydayand allso a childe goodþat dede for wus oppon the
                    Rodeand also a childe good and frerethat ded for wus oppon the Roode
                    tre
BodRawC86.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 149.
